alert.note: Alert for Hocking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 1:12AM EST until February 23 at 2:20PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers... Hocking River at Enterprise. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM EARLY THIS MORNING THROUGH THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hocking River at Enterprise. * WHEN...Until this afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The river comes out of its banks and begins to cover the flood plain area mainly near Rockbridge, with low areas near Enterprise also affected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 12:00 AM EST Wednesday the stage was 11.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early this morning to a crest of 12.2 feet this morning. It will then fall below flood stage this morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
